mapper.insert: /*신규교육 등록팝업*/ INSERT INTO TB_IEP_EDM001M( EDCT_NM, -- 교육명 EDIN_CD, -- 교육기관코드 EDCT_CLSF_CD, -- 교육분류 SNCT_TGT_YN, -- 결재여부 EDCT_CON, -- 교육내용 INBK_EDCT_YN, -- 교육구분 EGIN_APLY_YN, -- 고용보험여부 ONL_EDCT_YN, -- 온라인교육여부 EDCT_LEVL, -- 교육수준 USE_YN, -- 사용여부 RGSN_TS) -- 등록일시 VALUES( #{ edctNm }, #{ edinCd }, #{ edctClsfCd }, #{ snctTgtYn }, #{ edctCon }, #{ inbkEdctYn }, #{ eginAplyYn }, #{ onlEdctYn }, #{ edctLevl }, 'Y', SYSDATE())
mapper.update: /*교육내용 수정 */ UPDATE TB_IEP_EDM001M SET EDCT_CLSF_CD = #{edctClsfCd} -- 교육분류 ,SNCT_TGT_YN = #{snctTgtYn} -- 결재여부 ,EDCT_NM = #{edctNm} -- 교육명 ,EDCT_CON = #{edctCon} -- 교육내용 ,EDIN_CD = #{edinCd} -- 교육기관 ,INBK_EDCT_YN = #{inbkEdctYn} -- 교육구분 ,EGIN_APLY_YN = #{eginAplyYn} -- 고용보헙여부 ,ONL_EDCT_YN = #{onlEdctYn} -- 교육방식 ,EDCT_LEVL = #{edctLevl} -- 교육수준 ,USE_YN = 'Y' ,RGSN_TS = SYSDATE() WHERE EDCT_ID = #{edctId} -- 교육코드
mapper.select:
/*교육 차수정보 조회(팝업)*/ SELECT edc.EDCT_CNT_ID as edctCntId -- 교육차수ID , edc.EDCT_ID as edctId -- 교육ID , edc.EDCT_STTG_YMD as edctSttgYmd -- 학습시작일 , edc.EDCT_FNSH_YMD as edctFnshYmd -- 학습종료일 , edc.APLC_STTG_YMD as aplcSttgYmd -- 신청시작일 , edc.APLC_FNSH_YMD as aplcFnshYmd -- 신청종료일 , edc.CNCL_STTG_YMD as cnclSttgYmd -- 취소시작일 , edc.CNCL_FNSH_YMD as cnclFnshYmd -- 취소종료일 , edc.EDCT_STTG_TIM as edctSttgTim -- 교육시작시간 , edc.EDCT_FNSH_TIM as edctFnshTim -- 교육종료시간 , edc.EDCT_TRM as edctTrm -- 교육기간 , edc.CTCR_TIM as ctcrTim -- 이수시간 , edc.EDEX as edex -- 교육비용 , edc.FNSH_YN as fnshYn -- 종료여부 , edc.USE_YN as useYn -- 사용여부 , edc.RGSN_TS as rgsnTs -- 등록일시 , edm.EDCT_NM as edctNm -- 교육명 FROM TB_IEP_EDC001M EDC, TB_IEP_EDM001M EDM WHERE edm.EDCT_ID = edc.EDCT_ID
AND edc.EDCT_ID = #{edctId} # 조회조건 : 교육 ID
and edc.EDCT_CNT_ID = #{edctCntId} # 조회조건 : 교육 차수 ID
AND edc.USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY edc.EDCT_STTG_YMD ASC
mapper.insert: /*교육 차수추가 팝업*/ INSERT TB_IEP_EDC001M( EDCT_CNT_ID, -- 차수id EDCT_ID, -- 교육id EDCT_STTG_YMD, -- 학습시작일 EDCT_FNSH_YMD, -- 학습종료일 APLC_STTG_YMD, -- 등록시작일 APLC_FNSH_YMD, -- 등록종료일 CNCL_STTG_YMD, -- 취소시작일 CNCL_FNSH_YMD, -- 취소종료일 EDCT_STTG_TIM, -- 교육시작시간 EDCT_FNSH_TIM, -- 교육종료시간 EDCT_TRM, -- 교육기간 CTCR_TIM, -- 이수시간 EDEX, -- 교육비용 FNSH_YN, -- 차수완료여부 USE_YN, -- 사용여부 RGSN_TS) -- 등록일시 VALUES( NULL, #{edctId}, #{edctSttgYmd}, #{edctFnshYmd}, #{aplcSttgYmd}, #{aplcFnshYmd}, #{cnclSttgYmd}, #{cnclFnshYmd}, #{edctSttgTim}, #{edctFnshTim}, #{edctTrm}, #{ctcrTim}, #{edex}, 'N', 'Y', SYSDATE())
mapper.update: /*교육 차수수정 팝업*/ UPDATE TB_IEP_EDC001M SET EDCT_STTG_YMD = #{edctSttgYmd}, -- 학습시작일 EDCT_FNSH_YMD = #{edctFnshYmd}, -- 학습종료일 APLC_STTG_YMD = #{aplcSttgYmd}, -- 신청시작일 APLC_FNSH_YMD = #{aplcFnshYmd}, -- 신청종료일 CNCL_STTG_YMD = #{cnclSttgYmd}, -- 취소시작일 CNCL_FNSH_YMD = #{cnclFnshYmd}, -- 취소종료일 EDCT_STTG_TIM = #{edctSttgTim}, -- 교육시작시간 EDCT_FNSH_TIM = #{edctFnshTim}, -- 교육종료시간 EDCT_TRM = #{edctTrm}, -- 교육기간 CTCR_TIM = #{ctcrTim}, -- 이수시간 EDEX = #{edex}, -- 교육비용 RGSN_TS = SYSDATE() -- 등록일시 WHERE EDCT_CNT_ID = #{edctCntId} -- 교육id, 차수id
/*교육 차수수정 팝업*/ UPDATE TB_IEP_EDC001M SET USE_YN = 'N', -- 사용여부 RGSN_TS = SYSDATE() -- 등록일시 WHERE EDCT_CNT_ID = #{edctCntId} -- 차수id
mapper.select:
WITH EDC_INFO AS ( SELECT EDC.EDCT_CNT_ID, EDM.EDCT_CLSF_CD, CLD.EDCT_CLSF_NM, EDM.EDCT_NM, CLI.EDIN_NM , EDC.EDCT_STTG_YMD, EDC.EDCT_FNSH_YMD, EDC.FNSH_YN FROM TB_IEP_EDC001M EDC, TB_IEP_EDM001M EDM, TB_IEP_CLI001C CLI, TB_IEP_CLD001C CLD WHERE EDC.EDCT_ID = EDM.EDCT_ID AND EDC.USE_YN = 'Y' AND EDM.USE_YN ='Y' AND EDM.EDCT_CLSF_CD = CLD.EDCT_CLSF_CD AND CLD.USE_YN ='Y' AND EDM.EDIN_CD = CLI.EDIN_CD AND CLI.USE_YN ='Y'
AND (EDC.EDCT_STTG_YMD BETWEEN CONCAT(#{sttgYmd}, ' 00:00:00') AND CONCAT(#{fnshYmd}, ' 23:59:59') OR EDC.EDCT_FNSH_YMD BETWEEN CONCAT(#{sttgYmd}, ' 00:00:00') AND CONCAT(#{fnshYmd}, ' 23:59:59'))
AND EDC.EDCT_STTG_YMD BETWEEN DATE_ADD(NOW(),INTERVAL -1 YEAR ) AND NOW()
AND EDM.EDCT_CLSF_CD = #{edctClsfCd}
AND EDM.EDCT_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{edctNm}, '%')
), EDA_CNT AS ( SELECT EDCT_CNT_ID, COUNT(EDCT_APLC_ID) AS CNT FROM TB_IEP_EDA001M EDA WHERE APLC_STG_CD IN ('EDUFIN', 'APRFIN') AND USE_YN = 'Y' GROUP BY EDCT_CNT_ID ) SELECT EDC_INFO.EDCT_CNT_ID AS edctCntId , EDC_INFO.EDCT_CLSF_CD AS edctClsfCd , EDC_INFO.EDCT_CLSF_NM AS edctClsfNm , EDC_INFO.EDCT_NM AS edctNm , EDC_INFO.EDIN_NM AS edinNm , EDC_INFO.EDCT_STTG_YMD AS edctSttgYmd , EDC_INFO.EDCT_FNSH_YMD AS edctFnshYmd , EDC_INFO.FNSH_YN AS fnshYn , IFNULL(EDA_CNT.CNT, 0) AS edctAplcIdCnt FROM EDC_INFO LEFT OUTER JOIN EDA_CNT ON EDC_INFO.EDCT_CNT_ID = EDA_CNT.EDCT_CNT_ID ORDER BY EDCT_FNSH_YMD DESC
Limit #{pageSet} ,10

WITH EDCT_INFO AS ( SELECT EDC.EDCT_CNT_ID AS edctCntId , EDM.EDCT_NM AS edctNm , EDM.EDCT_CON AS edctCon , EDC.EDCT_STTG_YMD AS edctSttgYmd , EDC.EDCT_FNSH_YMD AS edctFnshYmd FROM TB_IEP_EDM001M EDM, TB_IEP_EDC001M EDC WHERE EDM.EDCT_ID = EDC.EDCT_ID AND EDC.EDCT_CNT_ID = #{edctCntId} ), EDA_LIST AS ( SELECT EDA.EDCT_APLC_ID AS edctAplcId , #{edctCntId} AS edctCntId , CMB.BRNM AS brnm , CMU.USER_ID AS userId , CMU.USER_NM AS userNm , EDA.CTCR_YN AS ctcrYn FROM TB_IEP_EDA001M EDA, TB_IEP_CMU001M CMU, TB_IEP_CMB001M CMB WHERE EDA.EDCT_CNT_ID = #{edctCntId} AND EDA.USE_YN = 'Y' AND EDA.USER_ID = CMU.USER_ID AND EDA.DVCD = CMB.BRCD AND EDA.APLC_STG_CD IN ('EDUFIN', 'APRFIN') ) SELECT * FROM EDCT_INFO LEFT OUTER JOIN EDA_LIST ON EDCT_INFO.edctCntId = EDA_LIST.edctCntId

SELECT CMB.BRNM AS brnm , CMU.USER_ID AS userId , CMU.USER_NM AS userNm , EDA.CTCR_YN AS ctcrYn FROM TB_IEP_EDA001M EDA, TB_IEP_CMU001M CMU, TB_IEP_CMB001M CMB WHERE EDA.EDCT_CNT_ID = #{edctCntId} AND EDA.USE_YN = 'Y' AND EDA.USER_ID = CMU.USER_ID AND EDA.DVCD = CMB.BRCD AND EDA.APLC_STG_CD IN ('EDUFIN', 'APRFIN')

SELECT EDO.APLC_ID AS aplcId -- 신청ID , EDO.APLC_TS AS aplcTs -- 신청일시 , CMB.BRNM AS brnm -- 부서명 , CMU.USER_NM AS userNm -- 직원명 , EDO.INBK_EDCT_YN AS inbkEdctYn -- 행내교육여부 , EDO.EDIN_NM AS edinNm -- 교육기관명 , EDO.EDCT_NM AS edctNm -- 교육명 , EDO.EDCT_CON AS edctCon -- 교육내용 , EDO.EDCT_STTG_YMD AS edctSttgYmd -- 교육시작일 , EDO.EDCT_FNSH_YMD AS edctFnshYmd -- 교육종료일 , APLC_STTG_YMD AS aplcSttgYmd -- 신청시작일 , APLC_FNSH_YMD AS aplcFnshYmd -- 신청종료일 , EDO.EDCT_STTG_TIM AS edctSttgTim -- 교육시작시간 , EDO.EDCT_FNSH_TIM AS edctFnshTim -- 교육종료시간 , EDO.EDEX AS edex -- 교육비 , EDO.ONL_EDCT_YN AS onlEdctYn -- 온라인교육여부 , EDO.EDCT_LEVL AS edctLevl -- 교육수준 , EDO.CNFA_YN AS cnfaYn -- 확인여부 FROM TB_IEP_EDO001M EDO, TB_IEP_CMB001M CMB, TB_IEP_CMU001M CMU WHERE EDO.APLC_ID = #{aplcId} AND EDO.USE_YN = 'Y' AND EDO.USER_ID = CMU.USER_ID AND CMU.USE_YN = 'Y' AND CMU.DVCD = CMB.BRCD AND CMB.USE_YN = 'Y';
